name: Gulpman
overview: Gulp 2 is a sequel to the game Gulp! where once again you have to move around various mazes eating all the dots to clear the mazes. The game is viewed from above with each maze seen on the whole screen. You are now chased by four Ogres and if you touch one then you lose one of nine lives but you are armed with a limited amount of lasers which fire in all four directions. Before you start you have a number of options that can be chosen and they are, pick one of 15 mazes, Tempo (1-9) and Grade (1-9). You also have a choice of two control methods and you can watch a demo.
